func runServeHttp(cmd *cobra.Command, _ []string) error {
	quit := make(chan os.Signal, 1)
	defer close(quit)
	signal.Notify(quit, os.Interrupt)
	logger := log.New(
		log.WithService(viper.GetString("app.name")),
		log.WithEncoding(viper.GetString("logging.encoding")),
		log.WithDebugEnabled(viper.GetBool("logging.debug")),
	)
	log.SetLogger(logger)
	tp, err := xotel.NewTracerProvider(cmd.Context(), xotel.TracerProviderConfig{
		Endpoint: viper.GetString("otel.tracer.endpoint"),
	})
	if err != nil {
		return errors.Wrap(err, "failed to create tracer provider")
	}
	otel.SetTracerProvider(tp)
	otel.SetTextMapPropagator(propagation.NewCompositeTextMapPropagator(propagation.TraceContext{}, propagation.Baggage{}))
	xotel.SetGlobalTracer(tp.Tracer(viper.GetString("app.name")))
	resolver.Register(dnssrvresolver.New())
	forecaGrpcClient := forecaPbv0.NewForecaProxyClient(getGrpcConnection(viper.GetString("services.foreca-proxy-endpoint")))
	locationsGrpcClient := locationsPbv0.NewLocationsServiceClient(getGrpcConnection(viper.GetString("services.locations-endpoint")))
	forecaService := adapters.NewForecaService(forecaGrpcClient)
	locationsService := adapters.NewLocationsService(locationsGr

func (s *ForecaService) GetForecastForLocation(ctx context.Context, id int) (*forecasts.Forecast, error) {
	ctx, span := xotel.Tracer.Start(ctx, "foreca-service:get", trace.WithSpanKind(trace.SpanKindClient))
	defer span.End()

	span.SetAttributes(attribute.Int("id", id))

	ctx = metadata.AppendToOutgoingContext(ctx, "request-id", requestid.GetRequestID(ctx))
	resp, err := s.client.GetForecast(ctx, &pbv0.ForecastRequest{LocationId: int64(id)})

	if err != nil {
		span.SetStatus(otelcodes.Error, "Cannot get forecasts.")
		span.RecordError(err)

		log.Error(ctx, "Error retrieving forecast for location.", zap.Error(err))
		return nil, err
	}

	return s.toDomain(resp), nil
}

func (s *ForecaService) GetForecastForLocation(ctx context.Context, id int) (*forecasts.Forecast, error) {
	ctx, span := xotel.Tracer.Start(ctx, "foreca-service:get", trace.WithSpanKind(trace.SpanKindClient))
	defer span.End()
	span.SetAttributes(attribute.Int("id", id))
	ctx = metadata.AppendToOutgoingContext(ctx, "request-id", requestid.GetRequestID(ctx))
	resp, err := s.client.GetForecast(ctx, &pbv0.ForecastRequest{LocationId: int64(id)})
	if err != nil {
		span.SetStatus(otelcodes.Error, "Cannot get forecasts.")
		span.RecordError(err)
		log.Error(ctx, "Error retrieving forecast for location.", zap.Error(err))
		return nil, err
	}
	return s.toDomain(resp), nil
}

func (s *LocationsService) toDomain(l *pbv0.Location) *forecasts.Location {
	return &forecasts.Location{
		ID:              l.Id,
		Lat:             l.Latitude,
		Lon:             l.Longitude,
		Timezone:        l.Timezone,
		Name:            l.Name,
		CountryCode:     l.CountryCode,
		CountryName:     l.CountryName,
		DivisionCode:    l.DivisionCode,
		DivisionName:    l.DivisionName,
		SubdivisionCode: l.SubdivisionCode,
		SubdivisionName: l.SubdivisionName,
	}
}

package i18n

import (
	"golang.org/x/text/language"
	"golang.org/x/text/message"
)

var SupportedLanguages = language.NewMatcher([]language.Tag{
	language.English,
	language.Dutch,
	language.French,
	language.German,
	language.Italian,
	language.Japanese,
	language.Korean,
	language.Portuguese,
	language.Russian,
	language.Spanish,
	language.Swedish,
	language.Thai,
	language.Vietnamese,
	language.Malay,
	language.Chinese,
	language.Finnish,
	language.Norwegian,
	language.Danish,
})

func GetLocaleFromHeader(acceptHeader string) language.Tag {
	tags, _, _ := language.ParseAcceptLanguage(acceptHeader)
	locale, _, _ := SupportedLanguages.Match(tags...)
	return locale
}

func Localise(locale language.Tag, text string) string {
	p := message.NewPrinter(locale)

	return p.Sprintf(text)
}
